maqras.text: 52|24|Ara tadera sebaya carapase ghuraghuri karabe kisorera, tara yena suraksita mukta.
52|25|Ara tara eke an'yera dike phire jijnesa karabe
52|26|tara balabe, niscaya age amara paribara-parijanera madhye sankita abasthaya chilama [1].
52|27|Atahpara amadera prati allaha anugraha karechena ebam amaderake agunera sasti theke raksa karechena.
52|28|Niscaya amara age'o allahake dakatama, niscaya tini krpamaya, parama dayalu.
52|29|Ata'eba apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana, apanara rabera anugrahe apani ganaka nana, unmada'o nana.
52|30|Naki tara bale, ‘se ekajana kabi? Amara tara mrtyura pratiksa karachi.
52|31|Baluna, ‘tomara pratiksa kara, ami'o tomadera sathe pratiksakaridera antarbhukta [1].’
52|32|Naki tadera bibeka-bud'dhi taderake e adesa dicche, baram tara eka simalanghanakari sampradaya [1].
52|33|Naki tara bale, ‘e kura'ana se baniye baleche?’ Baram tara imana anabe na.
52|34|Ata'eba, tara yadi satyabadi haya tabe etara mata kono bani niye asuka na [1]
52|35|tara ki srasta chara srsti hayeche, na tara nijera'i srasta [1]
52|36|naki tara asamanasamuha o yamina srsti kareche? Baram tara drrha bisbasa kare na.
52|37|Apanara rabera guptabhandara ki tadera kache rayeche, naki tara e sabakichura niyanta
52|38|naki tadera kono simri ache yate arohana kare tara sune thake? Thakale tadera se srota suspasta pramana niye asuka
52|39|tabe ki kan'ya santana tamra jan'ya ebam putra santana tomadera jan'ya
52|40|tabe ki apani tadera kache parisramika cacchena ye, tara etake ekati durbaha bojha mane kare
52|41|naki gayebi bisaye tadera kono jnana ache ye, tara ta likhache
52|42|naki tara kono sarayantra karate caya? Pariname yara kuphari kare tara'i habe sarayantrera sikara [1].
52|43|Naki allaha chara odera an'ya kono ilaha ache? Tara ye sirka sthira kare allah‌ ta theke pabitra
52|44|ara tara akasera kono khanda bhenge parate dekhale balabe, ‘eta to eka punjibhuta megha.’
52|45|Ata'eba, taderake chere dina se dina paryanta, yedina tara bajraghate hatacetana habe.
52|46|Sedina tadera sarayantra kono kaje asabe na ebam taderake sahayya'o kara habe na.
52|47|Ara niscaya yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche echara aro sasti. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na

52|48|ara apani dhairyadharana karuna apanara rabera sid'dhantera upara; niscaya apani amadera caksura samane'i rayechena [1]. Apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna yakhana apani dandayamana hana [2]
52|49|ara tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna ratera bela [1] o tarakara asta gamanera para [2].
53|1|Sapatha naksatrera, yakhana ta haya astamita [1]
53|2|tomadera sangi [1] bibhranta naya, bipathagami'o naya
53|3|ara tini managara katha balena na [1].
53|4|Tato kebala ohi, ya tara prati ohirupe prerita haya
53|5|take siksa dana karechena pracanda saktisali [1]
53|6|saundaryapurna satta [1]. Atahpara tini sthira hayechilena [2]
53|7|ara tini chilena urdhbadigante [1]
53|8|tarapara tini tara kachakachi halena, atahpara khuba kachakachi
53|9|Phale tadera madhye du dhanukera byabadhana ra'ila athaba tara'o kama [1].
53|10|Takhana allah‌ tamra bandara prati ya ohi karara ta ohi karalena [1]
53|11|ya tini dekhechena, tara antahkarana ta mithya baleni [1]
53|12|tini ya dekhechena tomara ki se bisaye tamra sange bitarka karabe
53|13|ara abasya'i tini take arekabara dekhechilena
53|14|‘sidaratula muntaha’ tatha prantabarti kula gacha era kache [1]
53|15|yara kache jannatula ma’oya [1] abasthita.
53|16|Yakhana kula gachatike ya acchadita karara ta acchadita karechila [1]
53|17|tara drsti bibhrama hayani, drsti laksyacyuta'o hayani [1].
53|18|Abasya'i tini tara rabera mahana nidarsanabalira kichu dekhechilena
53|19|ata'eba, tomara amake jana'o ‘lata’ o ‘uyaya' samparke
53|20|ebam trtiya arekati ‘manata’ samparke [1]
53|21|tabe ki tomadera jan'ya putra santana ebam allahara jan'ya kan'ya santana
53|22|e rakama bantana to asangata [1].

53|23|Egulo kichu nama matra ya tomara o tomadera purbapurusara rekhecha, yara samarthane allah‌ kono dalilapramana nayila karenani. Tara to anumana ebam nijedera prabrttira'i anusarana kare, athaca tadera kache tadera rabera paksa theke hedayata eseche [1].
53|24|Manusa ya caya ta'i ki se paya
53|25|bastutah akherata o duniya allah‌ra'i
